section.heading: Submission of studies to the Council.
section.text: OSSE shall submit the studies required in § 7-2011.02 and § 7-2011.03 to the Council no later than one year from August 1, 2017.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-11: § 7 of D.C. Law 22-11 provided that the creation of this section by § 5 of D.C. Law 22-11 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
Section 7038 of D.C. Act 22-130 repealed § 7 of D.C. Law 22-11. Therefore the changes made to this section by D.C. Law 22-11 have been given effect.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-11: § 7 of D.C. Law 22-11 provided that the creation of this section by § 5 of D.C. Law 22-11 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
Section 7038 of D.C. Act 22-130 repealed § 7 of D.C. Law 22-11. Therefore the changes made to this section by D.C. Law 22-11 have been given effect.
